page.title: 14ASCOT POLICE STATION
page.content: Ascot Police Station was built about 10 years ago. It is a small police station.There is a room where the Duty Officer works.He is the man who speaks to the public when they come into the station.There is a Communication Room where an officer can get in touch with other PC's through Walkie Talkies and this is also where all telephone calls are recieved. There are more than 5 people working at the station and only one of these is a woman PC.The two sargeants' names are S.Allen and S.McConky. There are two cells in this station.During the last year about one hundred and fifty arrests were made by officers from the station.
